sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from JXDX_GJYWKH JXDX_GJYWKH where 1=1 and JXDX_GJYWKH.KHH = '$KHH$' and KHRQ > $QSRQ$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select max(qsrq) from dxgx_yjgx_gjyw where 1=1 and KHH = '$KHH$'
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select KHRQ from JXDX_GJYWKH where 1=1 and KHH = '$KHH$'
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select min(qsrq) from dxgx_yjgx_gjyw gx where 1=1 and gx.KHH = '$KHH$'

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select JXDX_GJYWKH.KHMC as KHMC,JXDX_GJYWKH.KHZT as KHZT,JXDX_GJYWKH.KHRQ as KHRQ,JXDX_GJYWKH.KHH as KHH,khdx_jg.JGMC as JGMC, case when coalesce(max(dxgx_yjgx_gjyw.zlbl),0) = 0 then '无关系' when max(dxgx_yjgx_gjyw.zlbl)=100 then max(khdx_hy.hymc)||'|100' else cast('百分比:'||replace(replace(xml2clob(xmlagg(xmlelement(name a, khdx_hy.hymc||'|'||f_numtochar(dxgx_yjgx_gjyw.zlbl)||','))),'',''),'',' ') as varchar(200)) end as DQFPGX from JXDX_GJYWKH JXDX_GJYWKH left outer join dxgx_yjgx_gjyw dxgx_yjgx_gjyw on 1=1 and dxgx_yjgx_gjyw.KHH=JXDX_GJYWKH.KHH and $sysdate$ between dxgx_yjgx_gjyw.qsrq and dxgx_yjgx_gjyw.jsrq left outer join khdx_hy khdx_hy on dxgx_yjgx_gjyw.khdxdh=khdx_hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg khdx_jg on khdx_jg.jgdh=JXDX_GJYWKH.jgdh inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($sysdate$,$login_khdxdh$,$JGKHDXDH$)) qx on qx.khdxdh=khdx_jg.khdxdh where 1=1 and JXDX_GJYWKH.KHMC like '%$KHMC$%' and JXDX_GJYWKH.KHH like '%$KHH$%' and JXDX_GJYWKH.KHRQ between 20081231 and $JSRQ$ and JXDX_GJYWKH.KHRQ between $QSRQ$ and 29991231 and JXDX_GJYWKH.KHRQ between $QSRQ$ and $JSRQ$ group by JXDX_GJYWKH.KHMC,JXDX_GJYWKH.KHZT,JXDX_GJYWKH.KHRQ,JXDX_GJYWKH.KHH,khdx_jg.JGMC order by JXDX_GJYWKH.KHH

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select JXDX_GJYWKH.KHMC as KHMC,JXDX_GJYWKH.KHZT as KHZT,JXDX_GJYWKH.KHRQ as KHRQ,JXDX_GJYWKH.KHH as KHH,khdx_jg.JGMC as JGMC, F_WM_CONCAT(khdx_hy.hymc || dxgx_yjgx_gjyw.zlbl) DQFPGX from JXDX_GJYWKH JXDX_GJYWKH left outer join dxgx_yjgx_gjyw dxgx_yjgx_gjyw on 1=1 and dxgx_yjgx_gjyw.KHH=JXDX_GJYWKH.KHH and $sysdate$ between dxgx_yjgx_gjyw.qsrq and dxgx_yjgx_gjyw.jsrq left outer join khdx_hy khdx_hy on dxgx_yjgx_gjyw.khdxdh=khdx_hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg khdx_jg on khdx_jg.jgdh=JXDX_GJYWKH.jgdh inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($sysdate$,$login_khdxdh$,$JGKHDXDH$)) qx on qx.khdxdh=khdx_jg.khdxdh where 1=1 and JXDX_GJYWKH.KHMC like '%$KHMC$%' and JXDX_GJYWKH.KHH like '%$KHH$%'
and JXDX_GJYWKH.KHRQ between 20081231 and $JSRQ$
and JXDX_GJYWKH.KHRQ between $QSRQ$ and 29991231
and JXDX_GJYWKH.KHRQ between $QSRQ$ and $JSRQ$ group by JXDX_GJYWKH.KHMC,JXDX_GJYWKH.KHZT,JXDX_GJYWKH.KHRQ,JXDX_GJYWKH.KHH,khdx_jg.JGMC order by JXDX_GJYWKH.KHH

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from (select JXDX_GJYWKH.KHMC as KHMC,JXDX_GJYWKH.KHZT as KHZT,JXDX_GJYWKH.KHRQ as KHRQ,JXDX_GJYWKH.KHH as KHH,khdx_jg.JGMC as JGMC, case when coalesce(max(dxgx_yjgx_gjyw.zlbl),0) = 0 then '无关系' when max(dxgx_yjgx_gjyw.zlbl)=100 then max(khdx_hy.hymc)||'|100' else cast('百分比:'||replace(replace(xml2clob(xmlagg(xmlelement(name a, khdx_hy.hymc||'|'||f_numtochar(dxgx_yjgx_gjyw.zlbl)||','))),'',''),'',' ') as varchar(200)) end as DQFPGX from JXDX_GJYWKH JXDX_GJYWKH left outer join dxgx_yjgx_gjyw dxgx_yjgx_gjyw on 1=1 and dxgx_yjgx_gjyw.KHH=JXDX_GJYWKH.KHH and $sysdate$ between dxgx_yjgx_gjyw.qsrq and dxgx_yjgx_gjyw.jsrq left outer join khdx_hy khdx_hy on dxgx_yjgx_gjyw.khdxdh=khdx_hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg khdx_jg on khdx_jg.jgdh=JXDX_GJYWKH.jgdh inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($sysdate$,$login_khdxdh$,$JGKHDXDH$)) qx on qx.khdxdh=khdx_jg.khdxdh where 1=1 and JXDX_GJYWKH.KHMC like '%$KHMC$%' and JXDX_GJYWKH.KHH like '%$KHH$%' and JXDX_GJYWKH.KHRQ between 20081231 and $JSRQ$ and JXDX_GJYWKH.KHRQ between $QSRQ$ and 29991231 and JXDX_GJYWKH.KHRQ between $QSRQ$ and $JSRQ$ group by JXDX_GJYWKH.KHMC,JXDX_GJYWKH.KHZT,JXDX_GJYWKH.KHRQ,JXDX_GJYWKH.KHH,khdx_jg.JGMC order by JXDX_GJYWKH.KHH) count

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from (select JXDX_GJYWKH.KHMC as KHMC,JXDX_GJYWKH.KHZT as KHZT,JXDX_GJYWKH.KHRQ as KHRQ,JXDX_GJYWKH.KHH as KHH,khdx_jg.JGMC as JGMC, F_WM_CONCAT(khdx_hy.hymc || dxgx_yjgx_gjyw.zlbl) DQFPGX from JXDX_GJYWKH JXDX_GJYWKH left outer join dxgx_yjgx_gjyw dxgx_yjgx_gjyw on 1=1 and dxgx_yjgx_gjyw.KHH=JXDX_GJYWKH.KHH and $sysdate$ between dxgx_yjgx_gjyw.qsrq and dxgx_yjgx_gjyw.jsrq left outer join khdx_hy khdx_hy on dxgx_yjgx_gjyw.khdxdh=khdx_hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg khdx_jg on khdx_jg.jgdh=JXDX_GJYWKH.jgdh inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($sysdate$,$login_khdxdh$,$JGKHDXDH$)) qx on qx.khdxdh=khdx_jg.khdxdh where 1=1 and JXDX_GJYWKH.KHMC like '%$KHMC$%' and JXDX_GJYWKH.KHH like '%$KHH$%'
and JXDX_GJYWKH.KHRQ between 20081231 and $JSRQ$
and JXDX_GJYWKH.KHRQ between $QSRQ$ and 29991231
and JXDX_GJYWKH.KHRQ between $QSRQ$ and $JSRQ$ group by JXDX_GJYWKH.KHMC,JXDX_GJYWKH.KHZT,JXDX_GJYWKH.KHRQ,JXDX_GJYWKH.KHH,khdx_jg.JGMC order by JXDX_GJYWKH.KHH) count

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select distinct JXDX_GJYWKH.KHH,khdx_jg.JGDH as JGDH,khdx_hy.HYMC as HYMC,khdx_hy.HYDH as HYDH,DXGX_YJGX_GJYW.QSRQ as QSRQ,DXGX_YJGX_GJYW.JSRQ as JSRQ,khdx_jg.JGMC as JGMC,DXGX_YJGX_GJYW.ZLBL as ZLBL from dxgx_yjgx_gjyw dxgx_yjgx_gjyw inner join JXDX_GJYWKH JXDX_GJYWKH on 1=1 and JXDX_GJYWKH.KHH=dxgx_yjgx_gjyw.KHH inner join khdx_hy khdx_hy on dxgx_yjgx_gjyw.khdxdh=khdx_hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy khdx_jgcy on khdx_hy.khdxdh=khdx_jgcy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg khdx_jg on khdx_jgcy.jgkhdxdh=khdx_jg.khdxdh and $sysdate$ between khdx_jgcy.qsrq and khdx_jgcy.jsrq where 1=1 and dxgx_yjgx_gjyw.KHH = '$KHH$' order by dxgx_yjgx_gjyw.qsrq

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from (select distinct JXDX_GJYWKH.KHH,khdx_jg.JGDH as JGDH,khdx_hy.HYMC as HYMC,khdx_hy.HYDH as HYDH,DXGX_YJGX_GJYW.QSRQ as QSRQ,DXGX_YJGX_GJYW.JSRQ as JSRQ,khdx_jg.JGMC as JGMC,DXGX_YJGX_GJYW.ZLBL as ZLBL from dxgx_yjgx_gjyw dxgx_yjgx_gjyw inner join JXDX_GJYWKH JXDX_GJYWKH on 1=1 and JXDX_GJYWKH.KHH=dxgx_yjgx_gjyw.KHH inner join khdx_hy khdx_hy on dxgx_yjgx_gjyw.khdxdh=khdx_hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy khdx_jgcy on khdx_hy.khdxdh=khdx_jgcy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg khdx_jg on khdx_jgcy.jgkhdxdh=khdx_jg.khdxdh and $sysdate$ between khdx_jgcy.qsrq and khdx_jgcy.jsrq where 1=1 and dxgx_yjgx_gjyw.KHH = '$KHH$' order by dxgx_yjgx_gjyw.qsrq) a
sqlMap.delete: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ delete from dxgx_yjgx_gjyw where 1=1 and KHH = '$KHH$' and jsrq=29991231
sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dxgx_yjgx_gjyw set jsrq=$BEFORE$ where 1=1 and KHH = '$KHH$' and qsrq=(select max(qsrq) from dxgx_yjgx_gjyw where 1=1 and KHH = '$KHH$')
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dxgx_yjgx_gjyw set jsrq=$BEFORE$ where 1=1 and KHH = '$KHH$' and jsrq=29991231
sqlMap.delete: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ delete from dxgx_yjgx_gjyw gx where 1=1 and gx.KHH = '$KHH$' and gx.jsrq=29991231
sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update dxgx_yjgx_gjyw set jsrq=29991231 where 1=1 and KHH = '$KHH$' and jsrq=(select max(jsrq) from dxgx_yjgx_gjyw where 1=1 and KHH = '$KHH$')
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ insert into XTB_HYGXJL_GJYW(JLDH,GGBZ,KHDXDH,QSRQ,JSRQ,ZLBL) select $JLDH$,'$GGBZ$',gx.KHDXDH,gx.QSRQ,gx.JSRQ,gx.ZLBL from dxgx_yjgx_gjyw gx where 1=1 and gx.KHH = '$KHH$' and jsrq=29991231
